name: Royale Island Showdown
description:
A 4 player Battle Royale Style game. But each player is partnered with an AI controlled teammate that try to learn and adapt to how you play.

Players fly over and drop on to the island, where they will try to be the last one alive. They will work with their AI controlled teammate to gather guns and resources to fight against the other players. Everyone will need to keep moving as time goes on the wall will keep shrinking the safe space on the island.
